channel.title: discord on Hello, I'm Mark
channel.description: Recent content in discord on Hello, I'm Mark

item.title: Js_discord_bot
item.description: A fun project I like to work on no matter what language I’m learning is a Discord bot. It’s a nice way to start working with another big library and also a good way to learn about parsing user inputs. How fleshed out and active the communities are for the different languages all varies widely. Looking at C++, one of the major Discord libraries comes at around 170 stars on GitHub.
